overview:
Stephan has over 6 years of engineering experience in the UK high technology industry, having worked at several small start-ups as well as Cisco Systems and Symbian.

Prior to joining Advent, his experience covered networking, mobile telephony, IPTV and consumer electronics. In addition, Stephan spent a period of time as a strategy consultant at Booz Allen and Hamilton, working in the Communications Media and Technology team.

Stephan holds an MEng in Electrical Engineering and Information Sciences from Cambridge University and an MBA from INSEAD, where he was a Louis Franck scholar. He is fluent in English and Bulgarian.
